|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 10/06/2015 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B004AC6X0K |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "BL-R3070RD5 V0.1" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
The chip ID is not legible in the FCC internal photos but comments :on Amazon suggest that it is a [[Ralink]] RT3070.
